summary: A collection of unit tests that verify the behavior of Django's test discovery runner, covering commandâ€‘line argument parsing, locating and loading tests from packages, modules and dotted paths, handling duplicate or empty inputs, applying tag filters, pattern matching, ordering, debug settings, and allowing custom loader, suite and runner components.
business_intent: Provide confidence that the test discovery mechanism works correctly in Django projects, preventing regressions and ensuring developers can rely on accurate test discovery and execution across diverse configurations.
